message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the recommendation. I would like to counter with an offer of $160 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $165 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can do $168 for the product. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
Thank you, Alice. I'll take it at $167.
I can see you're serious about getting the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $169. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll accept it.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. How about $168?
I've given you a good deal, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $170. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Considering our previous discussions, I believe $169 would be a fair price for both of us.
